alert.note: Alert for Allen; Grant; Huntington; Kosciusko; Miami; Noble; Wabash; Wells; Whitley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 06 at 2:43AM EST until March 06 at 3:30AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Allen County in northeastern Indiana... Wabash County in north central Indiana... Southern Noble County in northeastern Indiana... Northern Grant County in central Indiana... Whitley County in northeastern Indiana... Huntington County in northeastern Indiana... Southeastern Kosciusko County in north central Indiana... Wells County in northeastern Indiana... Eastern Miami County in north central Indiana... * Until 330 AM EST. * At 243 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Winona Lake to 6 miles northwest of Wabash to 6 miles northeast of Kokomo, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Wayne, Marion, Huntington, New Haven, Warsaw, Peru, Wabash, Bluffton, Columbia City, North Manchester, Winona Lake, Ossian, Tri-lakes, Huntertown, Avilla, Churubusco, South Whitley, Sweetser, Andrews and North Webster. This includes the following highways... Interstate 469 between mile markers 0 and 15, and between mile markers 25 and 30. Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 266 and 322. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Grant; Huntington; Kosciusko; Miami; Noble; Wabash; Wells; Whitley
